posts.title: Quick Notes on Scrum Basics
posts.text: Quick notes of the Linkedin Learning Course ‚ÄúScrum: The Basics‚Äù by Kelley O‚ÄôConnell, with my own experience in the workspace. Problems to SolveWhat does the Team‚Äôs BACKLOG contain?A: a prioritized list of work that must be done Select something Scrum Teams do at the end of every sprint.A: Demonstrate the completed work. In the Agile Manifesto, Scrum values _.A: responding to change The Heart of the FrameworkAgile Project: Product Owner Scrum Master What are the 3 normal project constraints?time, cost, scope What are two key Scrum roles?Product Owner and Scrum Master What do you use to establish ground rules with the Team?Team Norms Getting Ready to WorkMinimun Viable Product (MVP) User Stories As a , I want so that . Acceptance Criteria (AC) Iteration (or Sprint) Planning Meetings (IPM) What do Scrum Teams use to break their work into small, deliverable elements?User Stories The Roadmap is meant to apply your work Themes over time.TRUE What types of estimation do Scrum Teams use to size their stories?Actual Estimation & Relative Estimation Getting Down to WorkWhat do Scrum Teams use to visually represent their project?Information radiators The Scrum Team must always work their stories in priority order.FALSE The PO can add a new story to a Sprint that the Team is currently in.FALSE All of the following are TRUE about the Daily Scrum except _. everyone stands up ‚úì it lasts 15 minnutes ‚úì everyone answers the same 3 questions ‚úì it lasts 30 minutes ‚úó Wrapping Up a SprintRetrospective The Team demonstrates the work they haven‚Äôt tested yet.FALSE This key Scrum role is the only one that can accept a story as done.Product Owner Why do Scrum Teams hold Retrospectives after every sprint?to recognize how they can improve their work practices

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server or: 1$ hexo s More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate or: 1$ hexo g More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy or: 1$ hexo d More info: Deployment
